name: LD48, Irrational Volumes
description:
____ finds a house on a hill. "That wasn't there yesterday." they wonder, and step inside. It seemed so inviting.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys to move

Hold Shift to focus and slow down (left or right shift)

Z or , to fire

Settings:

Toggle Fire/Focus: Check is to make its respective button a toggle instead of a hold

Invert Focus: Make the default speed slow, and the speed while holding shift fast.

Starting Lives: Self explanatory. 2 is the default, 0 counts as a life.

Game Speed: Slows down time to a minimum 50%. Does not work with sound effects

Player Fire Alpha: Sets the transparency of the player's own shots.
